FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course codiana activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Task name for codiana instance

FIELD.NAME: mainfilename
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the main class file. Startup class name.

FIELD.NAME: difficulty
FIELD.COMMENT: Difficulty of the task. 1 is easy 5 is hard.

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade method of the task. strick is 0. tolerant is 1. vague is 2

FIELD.NAME: languages
FIELD.COMMENT: Allowed languages for this task, binary coding.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the codiana activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: From when is task open.

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: When is task closed

FIELD.NAME: maxusers
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum user allowed for this task.

FIELD.NAME: maxattempts
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum attempts allowed for this task.

FIELD.NAME: limittimefalling
FIELD.COMMENT: The time threshold in ms where overstepping couses point loss, 100 - 0 points awarded

FIELD.NAME: limittimenothing
FIELD.COMMENT: The time threshold in ms after which is classification zero, zero points awarded

FIELD.NAME: limitmemoryfalling
FIELD.COMMENT: The value threshold in kB where overstepping couses point loss, 100 - 0 points awarded

FIELD.NAME: limitmemorynothing
FIELD.COMMENT: The value threshold in kB after which is classification zero, zero points awarded

FIELD.NAME: inputexample
FIELD.COMMENT: Input example

FIELD.NAME: outputexample
FIELD.COMMENT: Output example

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Language name, such as java or c++

FIELD.NAME: extension
FIELD.COMMENT: extension without dot, such as java, c, cpp, py

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: FK of user id

FIELD.NAME: timesent
FIELD.COMMENT: From when is task open.

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: State of the attempt, error, ok, wrong, output etc.

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: FK of the language id

FIELD.NAME: detail
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional details for server-side application (1 is zipped)

FIELD.NAME: runtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time is ms of the program run time

FIELD.NAME: runoutput
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of correct lines

FIELD.NAME: runmemory
FIELD.COMMENT: Max memory peak in kB

FIELD.NAME: resulttime
FIELD.COMMENT: Percentage value program run time

FIELD.NAME: resultoutput
FIELD.COMMENT: Percentage value of program correct lines

FIELD.NAME: resultmemory
FIELD.COMMENT: Percentage value of program memory stress

FIELD.NAME: resultfinal
FIELD.COMMENT: Final result

FIELD.NAME: resultnote
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional note to the result, may contain error description

TABLE.NAME: codiana_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: Request queue to be processed by server-side application

FIELD.NAME: taskid
FIELD.COMMENT: Codiana instance (task) unique id

FIELD.NAME: relatedid
FIELD.COMMENT: Either id of an student/teacher when solution check or teacher/managers id when plagiarism check request

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of a request - solution (0) or plagiarism (1)
